channel.title: I got a clan command from clanhandler.java

item.source: I got a clan command from clanhandler.java

item.title: I got a clan command from clanhandler.java
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

Your trying to add commands in clanhandler?
move all this to under customCommands int client.java

 if (command.startsWith("createclan")) {
	try {
	    String clanName = command.substring(11);
	    if(!clanName.equalsIgnoreCase("clan") && !clanName.equalsIgnoreCase("tempclanlist")) {
		if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) {
		    sendMessage("Sorry, the clan you have chosen already exists!");
		} else {
		    if(clanRights == 0) {
			server.clanHandler.createClan(clanName, playerName);
			server.clanHandler.appendToClans(clanName);
			clanRights = 5;
			myClanName = clanName;
			sendMessage("You have just created "+clanName+". You are the owner");
		    } else {
			sendMessage("You are already in a clan. You can't be in two!");
		    }
		}
	    } else {
		sendMessage("You can not make a clan with that name!");
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("Error creating clan");
	}
    } else if (command.startsWith("deleteclan")) {
	try {
	    String clanName = command.substring(11);
	    if(clanRights == 5 && myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName)) {
		clanRights = 0;
		myClanName = "none";
		server.clanHandler.deleteClan(clanName);
		sendMessage("You have deleted your clan "+clanName);
	    } else {
		sendMessage("You can't delete a clan when you're not the owner!");
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("Error deleting clan");
	}
    } else if (command.startsWith("joinclan")) {
	String clanName = command.substring(9);
	if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase("none")) {
	    sendMessage("You are already in a clan! You can't be in two");
	} else {
	    if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) {
		sendMessage("You have successfully joined "+clanName);
		server.clanHandler.addMember(clanName, playerName);
		myClanName = clanName;
		clanRights = 1;
	    } else {
		sendMessage("You can't join a clan that doesn't exist!");
	    }
	}
    } else if (command.startsWith("leaveclan")) {
	String clanName = command.substring(10);
	if(myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName) && clanRights < 5) {
	    sendMessage("You have successfully left "+clanName);
	    myClanName = "none";
	    clanRights = 0;
	} else if(clanRights >= 5) {
	    sendMessage("Leaders can't leave clans!");
	} else {
	    sendMessage("You can't leave a clan you aren't a member of!");
	}
    } else if (command.startsWith("clanowner")) {
	try {
	    String name = command.substring(10);
	    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
	    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
	    if(myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName) && clanRights == 5) {
		clanRights = 5;
		sendMessage("You are now an owner of "+myClanName);
		sendMessage(name+" is now an owner of "+myClanName+" alongside you");
	    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
		sendMessage("You can't make a player owner of your clan if they aren't already in it!");
	    } else {
		sendMessage("You need to be the clan owner to make other owners");
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
	}
    } else if (command.startsWith("mempromote")) {
	try {
	    String name = command.substring(11);
	    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
	    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
	    if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights <= (clanRights - 2)) && (clanRights == 5)) {
		clanRights++;
		sendMessage("You have promoted "+name);
		sendMessage("You have been promoted in the clan "+myClanName);
		sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+clanRights);
	    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
		sendMessage("You can't promote somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
	    } else if(clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) {
		sendMessage("You can't promote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!");
	    } else {
		sendMessage("You need to be an owner to promote a clan member");
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
	}
    } else if (command.startsWith("memdemote")) {
	try {
	    String name = command.substring(10);
	    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
	    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
	    if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights < clanRights) && (clanRights == 5)) {
		clanRights--;
		sendMessage("You have demoted "+name);
		sendMessage("You have been demoted in the clan "+myClanName);
		sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+clanRights);
	    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
		sendMessage("You can't demote somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
	    } else if(clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) {
		sendMessage("You can't demote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!");
	    } else {
		sendMessage("You need to be an owner to demote a clan member");
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
	}
    } else if (command.startsWith("memkick")) {
	try {
	    String name = command.substring(8);
	    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
	    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
	    if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights < 5) && (clanRights >= 5)) {
		myClanName = "none";
		clanRights = 0;
		sendMessage("You have been kicked from "+myClanName);
		sendMessage(name+" has been kicked from "+myClanName);
	    } else if(clanRights >= 5) {
		sendMessage("You can't kick other clan owners!");
	    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
		sendMessage("You can't kick somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
	    } else {
		sendMessage("You need to be an owner to kick other players from a clan");
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
	}
    } else if(command.startsWith("whatclan")) {
	try {
	    String name = command.substring(9);
	    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
	    client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
	    sendMessage(name+" is in the clan: "+myClanName);
	    sendMessage(name+"'s clan rights are: "+c.clanRights);
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("That player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
	}
    } else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mycstats")) {
	sendMessage("You are in the clan: "+myClanName);
	sendMessage("Your clan rights are: "+clanRights);
    } else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("myclanlist")) {
	try {
	    File file = new File("clans/"+myClanName+".txt");
	    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file));
	    String member = null;
	    sendMessage("Members of my clan:");
	    for(int i = 0; i < file.length(); i++) {
		while((member = br.readLine()) != null) {
		    sendMessage(member);
		}
	    }
	    br.close();
	} catch(IOException e) {
	    sendMessage("Error checking members list");
	}
    }
}

Read full topic

^ ClanHandler.java:260: class, interface, or enum expected String member = null; ^ ClanHandler.java:261: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("Members of my clan:"); ^ ClanHandler.java:262: class, interface, or enum expected for(int i = 0; i < file.length(); i++) { ^ ClanHandler.java:262: class, interface, or enum expected for(int i = 0; i < file.length(); i++) { ^ ClanHandler.java:262: class, interface, or enum expected for(int i = 0; i < file.length(); i++) { ^ ClanHandler.java:265: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ ClanHandler.java:268: class, interface, or enum expected } catch(IOException e) { ^ ClanHandler.java:270: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 90 errors Press any key to continue . . .

All 90, well if someone has a downloadable source with clans plz giv me the name of it and il try to find it, or PM me a clanhandler.java and a clanhandler.class ( so il not screw up )

item.source: I got a clan command from clanhandler.java

item.title: I got a clan command from clanhandler.java
item.dc:creator: @dragonlord dragonlord
item.description:
@dragonlord wrote:

100 errors is the only amount of errors for missing a { or } i think :S

[code]import java.io.*;

public class ClanHandler {

public void createClan(String clanName, String owner) {
try {
    BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./clans/"+clanName+".txt"));
    bw.write(owner);
    bw.newLine();
    bw.flush();
    bw.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
}
}

public void appendToClans(String clanName) {
try {
    BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./clans/clanlist.txt", true));
    bw.write(clanName);
    bw.newLine();
    bw.flush();
    bw.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
    System.err.println("Error adding to the clanlist.txt file");
}
}

public void deleteClan(String clanName) {
try {
    File file = new File("./clans/"+clanName+".txt");
    file.delete();
    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./clans/clanlist.txt"));
    BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./clans/tempclanlist.txt", true));
    String data = null;
    for(int i = 0; i < "./clans/clanlist.txt".length(); i++) {
	while((data = br.readLine()) != null) {
	    if(data.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName)) continue;
	    bw.write(data);
	    bw.newLine();
	    bw.flush();
	}
    }
    bw.close();
    br.close();
    File list = new File("./clans/clanlist.txt");
    list.delete();
    BufferedWriter bb = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./clans/clanlist.txt"));
    BufferedReader bn = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./clans/tempclanlist.txt"));
    String data2 = null;
    for(int i = 0; i < "./clans/tempclanlist.txt".length(); i++) {
	while((data2 = bn.readLine()) != null) {
	    bb.write(data2);
	    bb.newLine();
	    bb.flush();
	}
    }
    bb.close();
    bn.close();
    File tlist = new File("./clans/tempclanlist.txt");
    tlist.delete();
} catch(Exception e) {
}
}

public boolean checkClanExist(String clanName) {
try {
    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./clans/"+clanName+".txt"));
    br.close();
    return true;
} catch(IOException e) {
}
return false;
}

public void addMember(String clanName, String member) {
try {
    BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./clans/"+clanName+".txt", true));
    bw.write(member);
    bw.newLine();
    bw.flush();
    bw.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
}
}

public boolean checkClanMember(String clanName, String name) {
try {
    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./clans/"+clanName+".txt"));
    String userName = null;
    while((userName = br.readLine()) != null) {
	if(userName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
	    return true;
	}
    }
    br.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
    System.err.println("Error checking if this player is in given clan");
}
return false;
}

}

if (command.startsWith("createclan")) {
try {
    String clanName = command.substring(11);
    if(!clanName.equalsIgnoreCase("clan") && !clanName.equalsIgnoreCase("tempclanlist")) {
	if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) {
	    sendMessage("Sorry, the clan you have chosen already exists!");
	} else {
	    if(clanRights == 0) {
		server.clanHandler.createClan(clanName, playerName);
		server.clanHandler.appendToClans(clanName);
		clanRights = 5;
		myClanName = clanName;
		sendMessage("You have just created "+clanName+". You are the owner");
	    } else {
		sendMessage("You are already in a clan. You can't be in two!");
	    }
	}
    } else {
	sendMessage("You can not make a clan with that name!");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("Error creating clan");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("deleteclan")) {
try {
    String clanName = command.substring(11);
    if(clanRights == 5 && myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName)) {
	clanRights = 0;
	myClanName = "none";
	server.clanHandler.deleteClan(clanName);
	sendMessage("You have deleted your clan "+clanName);
    } else {
	sendMessage("You can't delete a clan when you're not the owner!");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("Error deleting clan");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("joinclan")) {
String clanName = command.substring(9);
if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase("none")) {
    sendMessage("You are already in a clan! You can't be in two");
} else {
    if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) {
	sendMessage("You have successfully joined "+clanName);
	server.clanHandler.addMember(clanName, playerName);
	myClanName = clanName;
	clanRights = 1;
    } else {
	sendMessage("You can't join a clan that doesn't exist!");
    }
}
} else if (command.startsWith("leaveclan")) {
String clanName = command.substring(10);
if(myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName) && clanRights < 5) {
    sendMessage("You have successfully left "+clanName);
    myClanName = "none";
    clanRights = 0;
} else if(clanRights >= 5) {
    sendMessage("Leaders can't leave clans!");
} else {
    sendMessage("You can't leave a clan you aren't a member of!");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("clanowner")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(10);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if(myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName) && clanRights == 5) {
	clanRights = 5;
	sendMessage("You are now an owner of "+myClanName);
	sendMessage(name+" is now an owner of "+myClanName+" alongside you");
    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't make a player owner of your clan if they aren't already in it!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be the clan owner to make other owners");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("mempromote")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(11);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights <= (clanRights - 2)) && (clanRights == 5)) {
	clanRights++;
	sendMessage("You have promoted "+name);
	sendMessage("You have been promoted in the clan "+myClanName);
	sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+clanRights);
    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't promote somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else if(clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) {
	sendMessage("You can't promote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to promote a clan member");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("memdemote")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(10);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights < clanRights) && (clanRights == 5)) {
	clanRights--;
	sendMessage("You have demoted "+name);
	sendMessage("You have been demoted in the clan "+myClanName);
	sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+clanRights);
    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't demote somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else if(clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) {
	sendMessage("You can't demote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to demote a clan member");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("memkick")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(8);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights < 5) && (clanRights >= 5)) {
	myClanName = "none";
	clanRights = 0;
	sendMessage("You have been kicked from "+myClanName);
	sendMessage(name+" has been kicked from "+myClanName);
    } else if(clanRights >= 5) {
	sendMessage("You can't kick other clan owners!");
    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't kick somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to kick other players from a clan");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
} else if(command.startsWith("whatclan")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(9);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    sendMessage(name+" is in the clan: "+myClanName);
    sendMessage(name+"'s clan rights are: "+c.clanRights);
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("That player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mycstats")) {
sendMessage("You are in the clan: "+myClanName);
sendMessage("Your clan rights are: "+clanRights);
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("myclanlist")) {
try {
    File file = new File("clans/"+myClanName+".txt");
    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file));
    String member = null;
    sendMessage("Members of my clan:");
    for(int i = 0; i < file.length(); i++) {
	while((member = br.readLine()) != null) {
	    sendMessage(member);
	}
    }
    br.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
    sendMessage("Error checking members list");
}
}

}
[/code]
try that. i didnt find anything missing either… all i did was add a } at the end

Read full topic

item.title: I got a clan command from clanhandler.java
item.dc:creator: @silabmods silabmods
item.description:
@silabmods wrote:

well i have this clan command added in clanhandler.java and i cant see were i forgoth to put } or ; or something like that, and it gives me like 90 errors ( better that 100 ).

this is all the content of my clanhandler.java

[code]import java.io.*;

public class ClanHandler {

public void createClan(String clanName, String owner) {
try {
    BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./clans/"+clanName+".txt"));
    bw.write(owner);
    bw.newLine();
    bw.flush();
    bw.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
}
}

public void appendToClans(String clanName) {
try {
    BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./clans/clanlist.txt", true));
    bw.write(clanName);
    bw.newLine();
    bw.flush();
    bw.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
    System.err.println("Error adding to the clanlist.txt file");
}
}

public void deleteClan(String clanName) {
try {
    File file = new File("./clans/"+clanName+".txt");
    file.delete();
    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./clans/clanlist.txt"));
    BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./clans/tempclanlist.txt", true));
    String data = null;
    for(int i = 0; i < "./clans/clanlist.txt".length(); i++) {
	while((data = br.readLine()) != null) {
	    if(data.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName)) continue;
	    bw.write(data);
	    bw.newLine();
	    bw.flush();
	}
    }
    bw.close();
    br.close();
    File list = new File("./clans/clanlist.txt");
    list.delete();
    BufferedWriter bb = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./clans/clanlist.txt"));
    BufferedReader bn = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./clans/tempclanlist.txt"));
    String data2 = null;
    for(int i = 0; i < "./clans/tempclanlist.txt".length(); i++) {
	while((data2 = bn.readLine()) != null) {
	    bb.write(data2);
	    bb.newLine();
	    bb.flush();
	}
    }
    bb.close();
    bn.close();
    File tlist = new File("./clans/tempclanlist.txt");
    tlist.delete();
} catch(Exception e) {
}
}

public boolean checkClanExist(String clanName) {
try {
    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./clans/"+clanName+".txt"));
    br.close();
    return true;
} catch(IOException e) {
}
return false;
}

public void addMember(String clanName, String member) {
try {
    BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./clans/"+clanName+".txt", true));
    bw.write(member);
    bw.newLine();
    bw.flush();
    bw.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
}
}

public boolean checkClanMember(String clanName, String name) {
try {
    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./clans/"+clanName+".txt"));
    String userName = null;
    while((userName = br.readLine()) != null) {
	if(userName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
	    return true;
	}
    }
    br.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
    System.err.println("Error checking if this player is in given clan");
}
return false;
}

}

if (command.startsWith("createclan")) {
try {
    String clanName = command.substring(11);
    if(!clanName.equalsIgnoreCase("clan") && !clanName.equalsIgnoreCase("tempclanlist")) {
	if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) {
	    sendMessage("Sorry, the clan you have chosen already exists!");
	} else {
	    if(clanRights == 0) {
		server.clanHandler.createClan(clanName, playerName);
		server.clanHandler.appendToClans(clanName);
		clanRights = 5;
		myClanName = clanName;
		sendMessage("You have just created "+clanName+". You are the owner");
	    } else {
		sendMessage("You are already in a clan. You can't be in two!");
	    }
	}
    } else {
	sendMessage("You can not make a clan with that name!");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("Error creating clan");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("deleteclan")) {
try {
    String clanName = command.substring(11);
    if(clanRights == 5 && myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName)) {
	clanRights = 0;
	myClanName = "none";
	server.clanHandler.deleteClan(clanName);
	sendMessage("You have deleted your clan "+clanName);
    } else {
	sendMessage("You can't delete a clan when you're not the owner!");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("Error deleting clan");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("joinclan")) {
String clanName = command.substring(9);
if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase("none")) {
    sendMessage("You are already in a clan! You can't be in two");
} else {
    if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) {
	sendMessage("You have successfully joined "+clanName);
	server.clanHandler.addMember(clanName, playerName);
	myClanName = clanName;
	clanRights = 1;
    } else {
	sendMessage("You can't join a clan that doesn't exist!");
    }
}
} else if (command.startsWith("leaveclan")) {
String clanName = command.substring(10);
if(myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName) && clanRights < 5) {
    sendMessage("You have successfully left "+clanName);
    myClanName = "none";
    clanRights = 0;
} else if(clanRights >= 5) {
    sendMessage("Leaders can't leave clans!");
} else {
    sendMessage("You can't leave a clan you aren't a member of!");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("clanowner")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(10);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if(myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName) && clanRights == 5) {
	clanRights = 5;
	sendMessage("You are now an owner of "+myClanName);
	sendMessage(name+" is now an owner of "+myClanName+" alongside you");
    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't make a player owner of your clan if they aren't already in it!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be the clan owner to make other owners");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("mempromote")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(11);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights <= (clanRights - 2)) && (clanRights == 5)) {
	clanRights++;
	sendMessage("You have promoted "+name);
	sendMessage("You have been promoted in the clan "+myClanName);
	sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+clanRights);
    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't promote somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else if(clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) {
	sendMessage("You can't promote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to promote a clan member");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("memdemote")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(10);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights < clanRights) && (clanRights == 5)) {
	clanRights--;
	sendMessage("You have demoted "+name);
	sendMessage("You have been demoted in the clan "+myClanName);
	sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+clanRights);
    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't demote somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else if(clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) {
	sendMessage("You can't demote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to demote a clan member");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
} else if (command.startsWith("memkick")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(8);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights < 5) && (clanRights >= 5)) {
	myClanName = "none";
	clanRights = 0;
	sendMessage("You have been kicked from "+myClanName);
	sendMessage(name+" has been kicked from "+myClanName);
    } else if(clanRights >= 5) {
	sendMessage("You can't kick other clan owners!");
    } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't kick somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to kick other players from a clan");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
} else if(command.startsWith("whatclan")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(9);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    sendMessage(name+" is in the clan: "+myClanName);
    sendMessage(name+"'s clan rights are: "+c.clanRights);
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("That player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mycstats")) {
sendMessage("You are in the clan: "+myClanName);
sendMessage("Your clan rights are: "+clanRights);
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("myclanlist")) {
try {
    File file = new File("clans/"+myClanName+".txt");
    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file));
    String member = null;
    sendMessage("Members of my clan:");
    for(int i = 0; i < file.length(); i++) {
	while((member = br.readLine()) != null) {
	    sendMessage(member);
	}
    }
    br.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
    sendMessage("Error checking members list");
}
}[/code]

Plz help me and tell me where its wrong.

Thank you

item.source: I got a clan command from clanhandler.java
